function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased social interaction in online shopping experiences","Impact":"Greater potential for the spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene protocols and virtual interaction strategies","Technologies":"Virtual reality, augmented reality, video conferencing, chatbots","People":"Online shoppers, customer service representatives","Owner":"Online retailers, technology developers"},{"Description":"Neglect of social distancing measures in online interaction","Impact":"Risk of spreading contagious diseases through close interactions","Mitigation":"Enforce social distancing guidelines in virtual interaction platforms","Technologies":"Virtual reality, video conferencing, chat platforms","People":"Online users, customer service representatives","Owner":"Platform developers, online service providers"},{"Description":"Higher demand for online shopping leading to increased exposure to contagious diseases","Impact":"Potential for widespread transmission of contagious diseases among online shoppers","Mitigation":"Enhance online service levels while implementing strict hygiene practices","Technologies":"AI-driven customer service, touchless interfaces, virtual reality shopping experiences","People":"Online shoppers, delivery personnel","Owner":"Online retailers, technology developers"}]}
